content.question: The female (Pwo) mask demonstrates continuity within the Chokwe artistic tradition through its

choices.label: inclusion of vibrant beadwork and geometric figures
full-figured facial characteristics and helmet shape
depiction of the ideal, graceful, and wise woman
use of animated components, controlled by hidden cords

content.answer: depiction of the ideal, graceful, and wise woman

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
